attributes.action: Return the position of Secretary of State for Defence to a full time role acknowledging the importance of the Armed Forces and Homeland Defence.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: UK Armed Forces are currently involved in 2 major conflicts along with many other operations around the world.  Despite the scale of operations, the current Government feel that only a part-time defence secretary is required.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
